name: Touhou ~ Chen Wants to Go Snowboarding
name_original: Touhou ~ Chen Wants to Go Snowboarding
description:
Local cat touhou wants to snowboard but has to get there first. Freezing temperatures and tank controls ensue. 

CONTROLS

  • Arrow keys / Left stick: Move (tank controls - up/down go forward/back, left/right turn)
  • Z / A: Interact

TEAM

haha it's Me (programming, art/models, music) - https://twitter.com/Rakaasac
